abstract.p: BBDO Worldwide takes top honors at Clio Awards ceremonies; BBDO is awarded 22 Clios, including one for agency network of the year; agency's British operation, Abbott Mead Vickers BBDO in London, is named agency of the year, winning 13 Clios; other winners noted (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: BBDO Worldwide in New York has taken top honors at the 2000 Clio Awards ceremonies.

At presentations in New York last week, BBDO, part of the Omnicom Group, was awarded 22 Clios, including one for agency network of the year. The agency's British operation, Abbott Mead Vickers BBDO in London, was named agency of the year, winning 13 Clios.
BBDO Worldwide in New York has taken top honors at the 2000 Clio Awards ceremonies.

At presentations in New York last week, BBDO, part of the Omnicom Group, was awarded 22 Clios, including one for agency network of the year. The agency's British operation, Abbott Mead Vickers BBDO in London, was named agency of the year, winning 13 Clios.

The Grand Clio for television went to the Chicago office of DDB Worldwide, also part of Omnicom, for a ''Whassup'' commercial for the Budweiser beer brand brewed by Anheuser-Busch. The Grand Clio for print went to DDB Paris, for a campaign for the Volkswagen Lupo. The Grand Clio for interactive work went to Arnold Communications in Boston, part of Snyder Communications, which is being acquired by Havas Advertising, for interactive work for Volkswagen of America.

Adidas, part of Adidas-Salomon, was named advertiser of the year in recognition of work created by two agencies in the last four years: Leagas Delaney in London and San Francisco and 180 in Amsterdam. The Clios are owned by VNU.
